name: how to install forge 1.16.5!
description:
step 1: Install the bottom files. 

step 2:Once you have installed java,if you haven't you will need it. right click on your forge .jar file you also downloaded, you also need it. and go to Open with > choose another app.

step 3: Press more apps and find "Java(TM) Platform SE binary".

click on always use this app to open .jar files.

then click OK then install forge and open the minecraft launcher and set your version to forge!

(optional) you can download my mod loader from the bottom and launch the bat to install any mods. (i have an example inside the Mods folder.)
